items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Beautify™’s Leave-In Conditioner is an essential part of the prep process.">
items.storedetaileddescription:
Beautify™’s Leave-In Conditioner is an essential part of the prep process. It’s safe for all hair types, and is designed to help defrizz and rejuvenate your client’s extensions & bio hair, making them both look and feel as good as new. It’s the best way to care for extensions during both installs and while during daily wear.

Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Close bottle lids tightly.

With proper storage, our liquid products have a shelf life of up to six months.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Close lid tightly.
Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin.
External use only, do not ingest.
Avoid eye contact.
Keep out of reach of children.
Test on a small area before use.
Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F).
items.displayname: Beautify - Leave-In Conditioner - 4 fl oz, Spray
items.storedisplayname2: Beautify - Leave-In Conditioner - 4 fl oz, Spray
items.storedescription:
Spray on hair as needed for a healthier look and feel. It adds moisture and detangles.

To avoid weakening adhesive bonds, do not apply directly to the roots of the hair or top of the extension wefts.

We recommend performing a patch test before use.
items.pagetitle: Beautify - Leave-In Conditioner - 4 fl oz, Spray | Walker Tape
